messages.content: Hi there! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions about signage or need help with a project, feel free to ask!
I want to have a sign for my storefront

That sounds great! I'd love to help you with that. Could you share a bit more about what you're envisioning for your storefront sign? For example, do you have specific dimensions, materials, or design ideas in mind?
I need a mockup for channel letters storefront sign
I'd be happy to help you get a mockup! First, could you please provide your email address so I can save your information and follow up with you?

Thank you for providing your email! I'd be happy to help you get a quote and create a mockup for your channel letters storefront sign. I'll need to collect some specific details from you. Let me open a form for you to fill out with all the necessary information.
I have submitted my quote request with all the details.

Perfect! Please email your logo files to info@signize.us so our designers can work with your brand assets. We'll review your requirements and get back to you with a mockup and quote within a few hours. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
I understand! Let me open the form again so you can modify your details. Here you go:
I have submitted my quote request with all the details.

Perfect! Please email your logo files to info@signize.us so our designers can work with your brand assets. We'll review your requirements and get back to you with a mockup and quote within a few hours. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
